articles.title: Year’s Strongest Meteor Shower Peaks: When To See The Geminids At Their Best - Forbes
articles.description: The only meteor shower produced by an asteroid rather than a comet, the Geminids reach a climax on December 13/14 in dark, moonless night skies.
